description: The Sabrent Mini MS-U3266 High Precision 3-Button USB Optical Mouse is ideal for users who require accurate and responsive navigation. Its 800 dpi resolution offers twice the precision of a regular mouse, making it indispensable for video editors, gamers and graphics and web designers. The retractable cable mouse is compact so you can carry it in laptop carry-bags with ease. It works on most non-transparent surfaces, and requires lesser space to deliver excellent performance. Further, the lightweight mouse also helps avoid cluttering your workspace. Also, it features an ergonomic design that allows for a fatigue-free experience even through long sessions.
title: Sabrent Mini High Precision 3-Button USB Optical Scroll Wheel Mouse with Retractable Cable (MS-U3266)
